perturbation.original_text: 6.1 Upfront Payment. Distributor shall pay to Zogenix, upon the receipt of the invoice from Zogenix after the Effective Date, a non-refundable, non-creditable upfront payment of Seven Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars (US $7,500,000), which upfront payment shall consist of [***] in consideration for the exclusive right to distribute Product in the Territory for the treatment of Dravet syndrome and [***] in consideration for the exclusive right to distribute Product in the Territory for the treatment of Lennox-Gastaut syndrome. Distributor shall pay such payment to Zogenix within [***] of receipt of the invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.1 Upfront Payment. Distributor shall pay to Zogenix, upon the receipt of the invoice from Zogenix after the Effective Date, a non-refundable, non-creditable upfront payment of Seven Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars (US $7,500,000), which upfront payment shall consist of [***] in consideration for the exclusive right to distribute Product in the Territory for the treatment of Dravet syndrome and [***] in consideration for the exclusive right to distribute Product in the Territory for the treatment of Lennox-Gastaut syndrome. Distributor shall pay such payment to Zogenix within 15 days of receipt of the invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction. Section 6.1 now specifies that the upfront payment is due within "15 days of receipt of the invoice".

perturbation.original_text: 6.3 Regulatory Milestones. Distributor shall pay to Zogenix the non-refundable, non-creditable milestone payments as set forth in this Section 6.3. Upon the occurrence of each milestone event in this Section 6.3 Zogenix shall issue an invoice to Distributor for the amount of the milestone payment corresponding to such achieved milestone event, and Distributor shall pay to Zogenix such invoiced amount within [***] of its receipt from Zogenix.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.3 Regulatory Milestones. Distributor shall pay to Zogenix the non-refundable, non-creditable milestone payments as set forth in this Section 6.3. Upon the occurrence of each milestone event in this Section 6.3 Zogenix shall issue an invoice to Distributor for the amount of the milestone payment corresponding to such achieved milestone event, and Distributor shall pay to Zogenix such invoiced amount within 60 days of its receipt from Zogenix.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction. Section 6.3 now specifies that the milestone payment is due within "60 days of receipt of the invoice".

perturbation.original_text: 6.4 Sales Milestones. For each Fiscal Quarter in which aggregate annual Net Sales first reach a threshold indicated in the table below, Distributor shall inform Zogenix within [***] that the aggregated annual Net Sales first reached such threshold. Zogenix shall issue an invoice to Distributor for the applicable milestone payment, and Distributor shall pay such invoice within [***] of its receipt from Zogenix:
perturbation.changed_text: 6.4 Sales Milestones. For each Fiscal Quarter in which aggregate annual Net Sales first reach a threshold indicated in the table below, Distributor shall inform Zogenix within [***] that the aggregated annual Net Sales first reached such threshold. Zogenix shall issue an invoice to Distributor for the applicable milestone payment, and Distributor shall pay such invoice within 90 days of its receipt from Zogenix:
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction. Section 6.4 now specifies that the sales milestone payment is due within "90 days of receipt of the invoice".
